entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who are being addressed by Umbridge, and he shows no fear in front of her. He also expresses his opinion that they have outgrown full-time education.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as Fred's twin brother, who shares the same opinion about having outgrown full-time education.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the Headmistress of Hogwarts, who is trying to discipline Fred and George for their actions in the school corridor.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as a teacher at Hogwarts, who is happy to see Umbridge taking action against Fred and George.

relationships.description: Umbridge addresses Fred directly in the conversation, trying to discipline him for his actions in the school corridor.
Umbridge also addresses George directly in the conversation, trying to discipline him along with Fred.
Filch is happy to see Umbridge taking action against Fred and George, and he supports her efforts to discipline them.
Fred and George are mentioned as twin brothers who share the same opinion about having outgrown full-time education.
